leacrosscode:Hit.NAME: Hit
leacrosscode:Hit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:SphereSaw.NAME: Sphere Saw
leacrosscode:SphereSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

leacrosscode:Hit&Block.NAME: Hit & Block
leacrosscode:Hit&Block.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Gain !M! Protection. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:TripleHits.NAME: Triple hits
leacrosscode:TripleHits.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!x2 damage to the front ennemi. Then, deal !M! damage to ALL ennemis. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:VPRCharge.NAME: VPR Charg√© !
leacrosscode:VPRCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an ennemi. Apply !M! Target. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:ShockJolt.NAME: Shock Jolt !
leacrosscode:ShockJolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL ennemis. Apply !M! Jolt to everyone.

leacrosscode:BoltDrink.NAME: Bolt Drink
leacrosscode:BoltDrink.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Max HP and draw !M! cards. Gain 1 Jolt. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
leacrosscode:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards then discard up to !D! cards. Gain 1 SP for each card discarded.

leacrosscode:StaticDash.NAME: Static Dash
leacrosscode:StaticDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Apply !J! Jolt to ALL ennemis. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:VPRSpam.NAME: VPR Spam
leacrosscode:VPRSpam.DESCRIPTION: Homing !M! bullets (!D! damage each). Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.NAME: Limitless Spam
leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.DESCRIPTION: Each time you hit with a bullet, gain 1 temp Strength.
leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Bullet to your hand. NL Each time you hit with a bullet, gain 1 temp Strength.

leacrosscode:Bullet.NAME: Bullet
leacrosscode:Bullet.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Homing !M! bullet (!D! damage). NL Exhaust.
